title: Seattle City Council 8/9/22
description:
Agenda: Call to Order, Roll Call, Presentations; Public Comment; Adoption of Introduction and Referral Calendar, Approval of the Agenda, Approval of Consent Calendar; CB 120356: Ordinance relating to floodplains; CB 120388: Ordinance relating to funding for housing and community development programs; CB 120386: Ordinance relating to City employment; CB 120387: Ordinance relating to City employment and Third Quarter 2022 Employment Ordinance; CB 120374: Ordinance relating to human rights; CB 120376: Ordinance relating to the City’s criminal code; Res 32062: Resolution relating to Seattle Parks and Recreation; CB 120364: Ordinance relating to the Traffic Code and parking for truck tractors in the public right of way; CB 120373: Ordinance relating to Seattle Public Utilities; Items removed from consent calendar; Adoption of other resolutions; Other business.
